name: Lions' Revenge: The Relioning Part II
name_original: Lions' Revenge: The Relioning Part II
description:
Created during Global Game Jam 2015. For some reason the web build on here is not the latest one... itch.io doesn't want to update when I upload the latest one.

Objective:
Survive the lions as long as possible
Punch people to feed them to the lions and slow them down
Avoid corpses in order not to trip
Collect energy drinks to regain your speed

Controls:
- Keyboard
A and D to move laterally
Mash W to sprint
Space to Jump
Ctrl to punch people

- XBox360 controller
Left stick to move laterally
Mash B to sprint
A to jump
X to punch people

Credits:
Greg Fortier - Design, Art and Code
Quentin Bellay - Design and Code

Music was found online ;-)
